he Lupinaxe was an enchanted axe whose head resembled a wolf. It belonged first to the human ranger Arielimnda and then to her husband Arun Maerdrym, both the parents of Khelben Arunsun.
The axe had several powers. First, it could summon a dire wolf. On contact with a foe, the axe emitted a howling noise like a wolf. If thrown, after contact, the axe would teleport back to the hand of its wielder.
The axe was used notably by Arun Maerdrym and his son Khelben in the  in the Sword of Anauroch to stop the vampire wizard Palron Kaeth and his allied phaerimm. The two agreed to sacrifice themselves by using the axe to shatter Khelbens Duskstaff of Sarael. This act obliterated Arun and Khelben and eliminated their enemies in the process, leaving a crater of glass behind.
